About

Growing up in Taiwan I've always had a passion for art and drawing. I graduated with a degree in Graphic Design in 2012 where I was already becoming fascinated with tattooing. It started with a classmate and no money... (we designed our own tattoos to apply on each-other). From there I was hooked and began to built my craft, studying and practicing, opening my own studio in Taiwan in 2016.

Want a price quote?
